author: Jim
content:
Don’t blame all Americans for Trump! He is an aberration, which will be eliminated in the next general election. We take pride in John Paul Jones, in the battle against HMS Serapis, but we have no pride in the current (temporary) occupant of the White House.

Am excited to see further news of the salvage of BHR!!

author: Linda Collison
content: This calls for a toast. I’m waiting for the exhibit…

author: Roger Crossland
content: What have you got against Scots, Jones and Trump? Careful, the UK is looking awfully rickety these days.

author: Peter Wright
content: A great victory but you ended up with Trump. Bury the hatchet and come back. We love you still!
